thread.title: Mandy Moore on How This Is Us Changed Her Life
thread.title_full: Mandy Moore on How This Is Us Changed Her Life

title: Mandy Moore on How This Is Us Changed Her Life
text: All the Stars at ELLE's Women in TV Celebration Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Moore also added that fans will have to wait to find out exactly what happened to Jack (played by Milo Ventimiglia), whom we know from the show's later-era scenes has passed away. "You're not going to know what happens with Jack for a while," she said, "probably not until the second or third season. But I think you're going to see the strains of a marriage toward the end of this season. We're getting ready to shoot the last two episodes, and I think that's the big plotline for us. There are definite cracks in the relationship and in the marriage, and how they will remedy that is anyone's guess." Most Popular The popularity of the show has, Moore said, "sort of shifted everything in my life, to be quite honest. I feel it's opened a whole world of opportunities back up to me that definitely weren't even there six months ago, three months ago. I've been waiting my whole life and career to be able to take on a role like this, that I feel I can really dig into, in the best possible way. It's challenging, it surprises me, I can really pour everything of who I am into it right now." More from ELLE:
